Title: What Is the Meaning of Detty December?
Summary: What Is the Meaning of Detty December? What is the meaning of the month in Lagos? Lagos is one of Nigeria's biggest cities where it transforms into one celebration .

Title: Liverpool’s Slot says ‘no issue to resolve’ with Salah after outburst
Summary: Liverpool's Arne Slot says there is 'no issue to resolve' with Mohamed Salah after outburst . Salah returned for Liverpool's 2-0 win against Brighton on Saturday . Hugo Ekitike scored at Anfield for the Reds .

Title: US troops in Syria killed in IS ambush attack
Summary: Two American troops and a civilian interpreter were killed in central Syria on Saturday . An alleged member of the Islamic State group opened fire on a joint US-Syrian patrol, officials said .

Title: Malami denies owning 46 bank accounts as Atiku, ADC allege witch-hunt
Summary: Former Attorney-General of the Federation and Minister of Justice, Abubar Malami has rejected allegations by the Economic and Financial Crimes Commission that he operates 46 bank accounts . Malami says he has links to recovered funds traced to the late military ruler, Gen. Atiku .

Title: John Cena retires from wrestling with final fight against GUNTHER tonight
Summary: John Cena will step into the ring for the final time on Saturday, December 14, 2025, bringing to a close a 20-year in-ring career that placed him at the centre of the company’s global marketing strategy .

Title: One minute of sex enough for me – Honeypot
Summary: Actress Onwuson Faith Ifeoma, better known as Honeypot, said one minute of sex is enough for her . She made the revelation as a guest on The Honest Bunch Podcast .

Title: Detty December: Lagos hotels, events sold out as fun seekers scramble for space
Summary: Nigeria’s annual end of year celebration known as Detty December has kicked off on a high note with hotels across strategic parts of Lagos fully booked . Major event tickets selling out rapidly as fun seekers scramble for space .

Title: Security forces kill another notorious bandit leader, Kachalla Na’Allah, in Sokoto
Summary: Combined security operatives have eliminated a notorious bandit, Kachalla Na’Allah, in a decisive operation in Isa Local Government Area of Sokoto State . A reliable security source said Na'Allah was shot dead on Friday during an interception between Girnashe and Kuka .

Title: $1 billion can’t lure me into politics — Oyedepo
Summary: The Presiding Bishop of the Living Faith Church Worldwide, Dr. David Olaniyi Oyedepo, says not even $1 billion can make him join politics . The Bishop urged the church to focus on the church’s annual convocation, Shiloh 2025 . …I warned the church of trouble in 2015, Dr

Title: Gov Diri orders autopsy on Bayelsa deputy governor’s death
Summary: Bayelsa State Governor, Douye Diri, has directed that an autopsy be conducted to determine the cause of death of the state’s Deputy Governor, Lawrence Ewhrudjakpo .

Title: ADC hopeful as APC, PDP clash over Osun, Ekiti gov polls
Summary: PDP National Chairman Tanimu Turaki says Osun and Ekiti are PDP strongholds . The African Democratic Congress says it is poised to make a strong impact in both states . The Independent National Electoral Commission has scheduled the governorship elections in Ekiti and Osun for June 20 and August 8, 2026 .

Title: Judges exempted from police withdrawal order, says CJN
Summary: Chief Justice of Nigeria, Justice Kudirat Kekere-Ekun has said that the presidential directive ordering the withdrawal of police officers attached to Very Important Personalities is part of measures to combat rising insecurity in the country . However, the media aide to the CJN, Tobi Soniyi, stated that the directive does

Title: Politics not my calling – Bishop Oyedepo
Summary: Presiding Bishop of Living Faith Church Worldwide, also known as Winners Chapel, David Oyedepo said politics is not part of his calling . The cleric made this statement on Saturday while delivering a sermon titled “The Last Days Are Ordained the Groundbreaking Days of the Church of Christ” during the church’s annual

Title: Nigerian soldiers spend sixth day in Burkina Faso detention
Summary: A Nigerian Air Force C-130 aircraft carrying 11 soldiers was forced to land in Burkina Faso on Monday after reportedly violating its airspace . The aircraft, which was on a ferry mission to Portugal, made a precautionary landing after the crew detected a technical concern shortly after takeoff from Lagos on 8 December 2025 . The Federal Government has

Title: FULL LIST: Dramatic comebacks in AFCON
Summary: The greatest comeback in the Africa Cup of Nations was staged by Mali in the opening match of the 2010 tournament as they wiped out a four-goal deficit against hosts Angola to snatch a draw . In 2022, Burkina Faso surrendered a three-goal advantage in a third-place play-off against hosts Cameroon in Yaounde .
